ygData.subject: Re: this may sound stupid...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, yes, the icky Mail question. Apparently, it depends if you got an envelope, or a backpack. I _think_ the backpack toes to Ton Twostring, and the envelope
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, yes, the icky Mail question. Apparently, it
depends if you got an envelope, or a backpack. I _think_
the backpack toes to Ton Twostring, and the envelope
goes to Felisity Starbright. I could be wrong,
however. But I'm pretty sure that mail goes to those
two.<br><br>I think you're safest giving it to Ton. Mail from
the Feerrott and Innothule Swamp, however, does go to
Felisity. <br><br>Ah, here are comments from two spoiler
sites:<br><br>"I'm not sure you CAN deliver mail to Felisity
STarbright in the bard guild in Freeport. I've tried twice
now to give her mail from Idia in the bard's guild in
Kelethin and neither of the times have I gotten the
correct response, just the oh i don't know what to do
with this but thanks bit. Does anybody else have this
problem?" (Yes, I've messed that up.)<br><br>And this:
<br><br>"Deliver all pouches of mail for Freeport to Ton Twostring
(he's the one that gives pouches of mail for other
cities). Deliver all letters for Freeport to Felisity
Starbright. This is regardless of what the NPC who gave the
mail told you to do. At least one NPC tells you the
wrong person to deliver to."<br><br>Note the difference
-- pouches to to Ton, letters to Felisity. Good
luck, and let us know how it goes.<br><br>Kharlisht
